job_title: QA Lead (5–7 years’ experience, 2+ years in Lead Role)
job_description:
QA Lead (5–7 years’ experience, 2+ years in Lead Role)

We are seeking an experienced QA Lead to oversee the entire quality assurance lifecycle, manage a team of QA engineers, and ensure the delivery of high-quality software products. The ideal candidate should have strong expertise in manual and automation testing, test strategy planning, quality processes, and team leadership.

Location

Infopark, Kochi

Work Mode

Work From Office (Mandatory)

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead and mentor the QA team by providing guidance, technical expertise, and domain knowledge to ensure timely completion of testing activities.
  • Review business requirements, functional specifications, and design documents to ensure complete test coverage across all features.
  • Prepare and maintain comprehensive QA documentation, including test plans, test cases, user flow diagrams, and coverage reports.
  • Plan and execute regression testing for each release, delegate tasks to junior QA members, and collaborate closely with the development team to ensure high-quality, on-time delivery.
  • Perform functional testing, database validation, and log analysis to ensure stability and reliability of the web application (Spring MVC) and Spring Boot–based API services.
  • Manage test environments, test data, and automation scripts; evaluate and recommend suitable automation frameworks, tools, and technologies to enhance testing efficiency.
  • Ensure adherence to QA processes, best practices, and documentation standards aligned with the SDLC.
  • Coordinate with cross-functional teams including development, project management, business teams, and clients to resolve issues and support smooth release cycles.
  • Identify root causes of recurring issues, implement corrective actions, and continuously monitor the application to prevent recurring defects.
  • Explore and propose new automation tools, ideas, and methodologies to improve testing efficiency and coverage.

Required Skills & Experience

  • Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 5–7 years of experience in QA with minimum 2+ years in a lead or leadership role.
  • Strong knowledge of manual and automation testing methodologies.
  • Hands-on experience with API testing tools and performance testing tools.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with exceptional attention to detail.
  • Excellent leadership, communication, and stakeholder management skills.
  • ISTQB or similar certification is an added advantage.

Contact

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at athr@empaysoft.com.
summary: Lead QA team to ensure high-quality software delivery through manual and automation testing, test strategy, and cross-functional collaboration. Manage testing processes, mentor engineers, and implement automation tools for efficient quality assurance.

job_description:
UI/UX Designer

We are seeking a UI/UX Designer who can take ownership of features and projects end-to-end and contribute meaningfully to product decisions. This role goes beyond designing screens — it requires understanding user problems, collaborating closely with stakeholders, and translating ideas into thoughtful, intuitive digital experiences. The ideal candidate is comfortable working independently, asking the right questions, and balancing UX thinking with strong UI execution.

Key Responsibilities

  • Own the UI/UX design process for assigned features or projects from concept to delivery
  • Work closely with product managers, developers, and stakeholders to understand business goals and user needs
  • Translate problem statements into user flows, wireframes, and high-fidelity designs
  • Conduct user research, competitor analysis, and usability reviews to inform design decisions
  • Create and maintain consistent UI patterns and design systems across products
  • Present design ideas clearly and explain the reasoning behind decisions
  • Collaborate with developers during implementation to ensure design quality and usability
  • Continuously improve existing experiences based on feedback and product learnings

What We’re Looking For

  • 1–3 years of hands-on experience in UI/UX or Product Design
  • Strong understanding of user-centered design principles
  • Ability to think beyond visuals and focus on solving real user problems
  • Proficiency in design tools such as Figma (Adobe XD / Sketch knowledge is a plus)
  • A solid portfolio showcasing design process, problem-solving, and final outcomes
  • Basic understanding of responsive design and how designs translate to development
  • Good communication skills and the ability to work cross-functionally

Nice to Have

  • Experience working on real products with multiple stakeholders
  • Familiarity with accessibility and mobile-first design principles
  • Basic understanding of HTML/CSS
  • Ability to work in fast-paced or ambiguous environments

What This Role Is NOT

  • Not just a UI execution role
  • Not limited to following instructions or handing off screens
